books.title: Clean Code
books.author: Robert C. Martin
books.overview: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship.

books.title: The Pragmatic Programmer
books.author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
books.overview: Practical tips and philosophies for becoming a better programmer.

books.title: Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software
books.author: Erich Gamma, Richard Helm, Ralph Johnson, John Vlissides
books.overview: Introduces 23 classic design patterns for object-oriented programming.

books.title: Refactoring: Improving the Design of Existing Code
books.author: Martin Fowler
books.overview: Techniques for restructuring existing code to improve readability and maintainability.

books.title: Introduction to Algorithms
books.author: Thomas H. Cormen, Charles E. Leiserson, Ronald L. Rivest, Clifford Stein
books.overview: Comprehensive textbook on algorithms, widely used in universities worldwide.
